lHem8diBHDAs.code:
const arpeggiator = [
  "{d4 bb3 eb3 d3 bb2 eb2}%16",
  "{c4 bb3 f3 c3 bb2 g2}%16",
  "{d4 bb3 g3 d3 bb2 g2}%16",
  "{d4 bb3 f3 c3 bb2 f2}%16",
]

main_arp: note(pick(arpeggiator, "<0 1.5 1 2 3>".slow(2))).rev()
  .sound("supersaw")
  .lpf(300)
  .sustain(0.5).release(0.01).attack(0)
  .room(0.6)
  .lpenv(slider(2.6598,2.2,6))
  
  ._punchcard({heigh:250, width:1000})

$: note("<2 [c3,g3,e4] [bb2,f3,d4] [a2,f3,c4] [bb2,g3,eb4]>")
.sound("sawtooth").vowel("<a e i o>")._punchcard().color("red").lpenv(slider(1.72,1,6))

$: note("<2 [c2 c3]*4 [bb1 bb2]*4 [f2 f3]*4 [eb2 eb3]*4>")
.sound("sawtooth").lpf("200 1000 200 1000")
.room(2).gain(.4)._punchcard().color("cyan") .lpenv(slider(1,1,6))



$: note("<[c2 c3]*4 [bb1 bb2]*4 [f2 f3]*4 [eb2 eb3]*4 [c2 c3]*4 [bb1 bb2]*4 [f2 f3]*4 [eb2 eb3]*4>")
.sound("sawtooth").lpf(900).gain("[1]")
.lpf(sine.range(100, 2000).slow(4))._scope().color("green") .lpenv(slider(1.23,1,6))
await initHydra()
let pattern = "[3 6 6  4 3 [3 6 3 7]*2]*1"
shape(H(pattern)).color(0.1,0.1,1).scale(0.3).rotate( () => time%360 ).out(o0)
n(pattern).scale("A:minor").piano().room(1)
//$: note("[<d5 c5> bb4 a4 f4]/4").sound("gm_pad_new_age").echo(8, 0.38/2, 0.5).room(4).lpf(300)

$: stack(
  s("rhodespolaris_bd").room(.5).delay(.5).late(8),
)

  .note().sound("square").cutoff(1500).room(.6).speed(13)

setGainCurve(x=> Math.pow(x, 2))
samples('github:switchangel/breaks')
samples('github:switchangel/pad')
samples('github:tidalcycles/uzu-drumkit')
setCps(170/60/4)

$:
 s("breaks/2").fit().orbit(2).room(.4).postgain(slider(0,0,1))


bassline: note("[eb1, eb2]!16 [f2, f1]!16 [g2, g1]!16 [f2, f1]!8 [bb2, bb1]!8")
  .sound("supersaw")
  .slow(8)
  .postgain(2)
  .room(0.6)
  .lpf(slider(687.6,300,2000))
  .room(0.4)
  ._punchcard({heigh:200, width:1670}).postgain(slider(0.294,0,2))

$: 
 s("bassnotes").struct("x(2,8)")
  .detune(.5)
  .unison(4)
  .decay(0.25).release(1).sustain(0.3)
  .gain(1.5)
.lpf(slider(1818.1,300,2000))
.postgain(slider(0.138,0,2))

const arpeggiator = [
  "{d4 bb3 eb3 d3 bb2 eb2}%16",
  "{c4 bb3 f3 c3 bb2 g2}%16",
  "{d4 bb3 g3 d3 bb2 g2}%16",
  "{d4 bb3 f3 c3 bb2 f2}%16",
]

main_arp: note(pick(arpeggiator, "<0 1.5 1 2 3>".slow(2))).rev()
  .sound("supersaw")
  .lpf(300)
  .sustain(0.5).release(0.01).attack(0)
  .room(0.6)
  .lpenv(slider(2.304,2,6))
  .postgain(slider(1.512,0,2))
  
  ._punchcard({heigh:250, width:1000})
$:  
 n("{4 0 4 3 4 5 4 3 4 0 4 3 4 6 4 5 4 0 4 3 4 5 4 3 4 0 4 3 4 7 4 6 4 3 4 0}")
  .scale("C:minor").clip(2)
  .s("gm_electric_guitar_clean")
  .struct("x x x x x x x x")
  .gain(1).detune(0.0).unison(2).lpenv(1).postgain(0.5)


 $:

 s("{~ ~ rim ~ cp ~ rim ~ cp ~!2 rim ~ cp ~ < rim ~ >!2}%8")
    .bank(["KorgDDM110", "dmx"])
    .speed(1.2)
    .fast(2)

drums: stack(
  s("tech:5").postgain(6).pcurve(2).pdec(1),

  s("sh").struct("[x!3 ~!2 x!10 ~]").postgain(0.5).lpf(7000).bank("RolandTR808").speed(0.8).jux(rev).room(sine.range(0.1, 0.4)),
  
  s("hh").struct("x*16").postgain(0.5).bank("RolandTR808").speed(1).jux(rev).room(sine.range(0.1, 0.4)).gain(0.6),
  
  s("~ hh").bank("RolandTR808").room(0.3).speed(0.75).gain(1.2).fast(4),
  
  s("psr:[2|5|6|7|8|9|12|24|25]").fast(16).almostNever(ply("0")).hpf(1000).speed(0.5)
  ).postgain(0.3)

t-us0a0cdNZY.code:
drums: stack(
  s("tech:5")
    .postgain(6)
    .pcurve(2)
    .pdec(1),


  s("sh").struct("[x!3 ~!2 x!10 ~]")
    .postgain(0.5)
    .lpf(7000)
    .bank("RolandTR808")
    .speed(0.8)
    .jux(rev)
    .room(sine.range(0.1, 0.4)),
  s("hh")
    .struct("x*16")
    .postgain(0.5)
    .bank("RolandTR808")
    .speed(1)
    .jux(rev)
    .room(sine.range(0.1, 0.4))
    .gain(0.6),
  s("~ hh")
    .bank("RolandTR808")
    .room(0.3)
    .speed(0.75)
    .gain(1.2)
    .fast(4),
  s("psr:[2|5|6|7|8|9|12|24|25]")
    .fast(16)
    .almostNever(ply("0"))
    .hpf(1000)
    .speed(0.5)
  )
